# MyProject - Example Documentation Hub

A demonstration project showing how Introligo's Hub Mode automatically discovers and organizes documentation.

## Features

- ðŸš€ Fast and efficient
- ðŸ“¦ Easy to install
- ðŸ”§ Highly configurable
- ðŸ“– Well documented

## Quick Start

```bash
pip install myproject
```

```python
from myproject import MyClass

# Create instance
obj = MyClass()
result = obj.process()
```

## Installation

### Via pip

```bash
pip install myproject
```

### From source

```bash
git clone https://github.com/user/myproject.git
cd myproject
pip install -e .
```

For complete documentation, visit [our docs](https://myproject.readthedocs.io).
